review: I have the Roku 3 and now the Roku 3500R Streaming Stick.  Both work great and the streaming stick works amazingly good for how small it is.  The USB power cord worked with my LG TV which is several years old.  I am glad I got this over the Google chromecast.

review: We had a few problems with the original set up.  I am not sure if user error was part of the issue or if it was something else.  But for the first few weeks we had a really hard time using this.  The screen would jump from one channel to another and would not select the channel selected.  I honestly don't know what we did, if anything, to make it stop, but is now working great.  I really enjoy the different channels and options for use.  We have not explored all the options, but we like it enough that I am planning on getting another ROKU that will work with any tv.  The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because of the original issues we had.  I recommend this to anyone I think would enjoy it and a few people I know have either already purchased one for themselves or are planning on getting one.
author: Amazon Customer
